get.description: Returns all lists based on the search criteria.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of records to return. The default is 25 and the maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The start of the page offset. The default is from the beginning.

get.summary: Get a single list by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list.

put.description: Updates list specified in the URL.  Only the fields provided in the supplied object will be updated, missing fields will not be altered.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the list.

ID.description: Optional. Defines whether the search criteria should apply to the CODE or to the TEXT.

URI.description: Optional. Defines whether the search criteria should apply to the CODE or to the TEXT.

ConnectorID.description: Optional. Defines whether the search criteria should apply to the CODE or to the TEXT.

DisplayCodeFirst.description: Optional. Defines whether CODE should appear before TEXT, or vice-versa.

ExternalThreshold.description: Optional. Default value is 1. Defines the threshold from where the level starts being external. This value can only be set if a ConnectorID is provided.
